name: The God Must Be Scrollolo
description:
The god is drunk and he suspects that one planet has gone crazy. A messenger was sent to the world to live and learn the world, so that they could create some holy scroll to be the world's guide. Will you create a great holy scroll to save the world, or indeed will ruin the world?

Gameplay :

Scroll Your Mouse

This game is compilation of mini game made possible by scrolling. Everytime one event is finished, player will be rewarded by one verses chosen from two available verses based on your score. Collect more good verses than bad verses to create good holy book! People will try and ask themselves "What do we do?"
